Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total

#90 0' 1.3"
2.2 lbs. 		Balloon Pokémon Its soft and pliable body is very bouncy. When it sings continuously with all its might, its body steadily turns a deepening pink color.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Cute Charm 4 Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
1 Competitive 7 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
18 Soundproof 7 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
36 Thick Fat 7 A layer of thick fat halves the damage the Pokémon takes from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
54 Friend Guard 2 Reduces damage done to allies.
72 Frisk 5 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
90 Costar 4 When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.
100 Magic Bounce 11 Reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 02 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 21 Poison Heal 8 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
Disc 24 Levitate 8 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Disc 25 Super Luck 5 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Competitive 7 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
Costar 4 When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.
Cute Charm 4 Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Drowsy Aura 6 Contact with the Pokémon may put the attacker to sleep.
Friend Guard 2 Reduces damage done to allies.
Frisk 5 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
Fur Coat 9 Halves the damage from physical moves.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Liquid Voice 5 All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
Magic Bounce 11 Reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.
Pixilate 8 Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Soundproof 7 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Thick Fat 7 A layer of thick fat halves the damage the Pokémon takes from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unburden 8 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
Well-Baked Body 5 Blocks Fire-type moves to sharply boost the Pokémon's Defense.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
